targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) AS total FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT if(count() = 0, 0, round(count() / greatest(dateDiff('second', min(timestamp), max(timestamp)), 1), 2)) AS rps FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT uniqExact(remote_addr) AS unique_ips FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT round(countIf(status >= 400 AND status != 444) * 100.0 / count(), 2) AS error_rate FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT round(quantile(0.95)(request_time) * 1000, 2) AS p95_ms FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND request_time > 0 AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT if(countIf(upstream_cache_status != '') = 0, 0, round(countIf(upstream_cache_status = 'HIT') * 100.0 / countIf(upstream_cache_status != ''), 2)) AS cache_hit_pct FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT sum(bytes_sent) AS bandwidth FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT round(countIf(cf_ray != '') * 100.0 / count(), 2) AS cf_pct FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country'

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT host, count() AS requests, round(quantile(0.95)(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS p95_ms, countIf(status >= 500) AS errors_5xx FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) GROUP BY host ORDER BY requests DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time, round(quantile(0.5)(request_time) * 1000, 2) AS p50, round(quantile(0.95)(request_time) * 1000, 2) AS p95, round(quantile(0.99)(request_time) * 1000, 2) AS p99 FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND request_time > 0 AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time, round(quantile(0.95)(upstream_response_time) * 1000, 2) AS backend_p95, round(quantile(0.95)(request_time - upstream_response_time) * 1000, 2) AS nginx_overhead_p95 FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND upstream_response_time > 0 AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT path, count() AS requests, round(avg(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS avg_ms, round(quantile(0.95)(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS p95_ms, countIf(status >= 400) AS errors FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY path ORDER BY requests DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT path, count() AS requests, round(quantile(0.5)(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS p50_ms, round(quantile(0.95)(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS p95_ms, round(quantile(0.99)(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS p99_ms FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND request_time > 0 AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY path HAVING requests > 5 ORDER BY p95_ms DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time, multiIf(status < 300, '2xx OK', status < 400, '3xx Redirect', status < 500, '4xx Client Error', status = 444, 'Blocked', '5xx Server Error') AS status_class, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY time, status_class ORDER BY time

SELECT status, count() AS count, round(count() * 100.0 / sum(count()) OVER (), 2) AS pct, any(path) AS example_path FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND status >= 400 AND status != 444 AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY status ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 15

SELECT country_code, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND country_code != '' AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY country_code ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time, multiIf(cf_ray != '', 'Via CDN', status = 444, 'Blocked', 'Direct') AS traffic_type, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY time, traffic_type ORDER BY time

SELECT country_code, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND country_code != '' AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY country_code ORDER BY requests DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT source_host, count() AS requests, round(countIf(status >= 500) * 100.0 / count(), 2) AS error_pct, round(quantile(0.95)(request_time) * 1000, 0) AS p95_ms FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY source_host ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT if(upstream_cache_status = '', 'No Cache', upstream_cache_status) AS cache_status, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY cache_status ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT if(ssl_protocol = '', 'No SSL', ssl_protocol) AS protocol, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY protocol ORDER BY requests DESC

SELECT method, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY method ORDER BY requests DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT timestamp, host, path, round(request_time * 1000, 0) AS total_ms, round(upstream_response_time * 1000, 0) AS upstream_ms, status, remote_addr FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND request_time > 2 AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' ORDER BY request_time DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT user_agent, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' GROUP BY user_agent ORDER BY requests DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT referer, count() AS requests FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND host LIKE '$host' AND toString(status) LIKE '$status' AND method LIKE '$method' AND country_code LIKE '$country' AND referer != '' GROUP BY referer ORDER BY requests DESC LIMIT 20

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT host FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE timestamp > now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY host
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT host FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE timestamp > now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY host

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT method FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access ORDER BY method
list.label: Method
list.name: method
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT method FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access ORDER BY method

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(status) FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access ORDER BY status
list.label: Status
list.name: status
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(status) FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access ORDER BY status

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT country_code FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE country_code != '' ORDER BY country_code
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT country_code FROM logs_nginx_${deployment_env}.access WHERE country_code != '' ORDER BY country_code
